website_summaries.verdict: Chamuel’s all-natural tea tree-based balm hydrates and softens skin and is vitamin-rich, making it fantastic for treating eczema, sensitive skin, and dry skin.
pros: Soothes wide range of skin ailments
Formulated with completely natural ingredients like tea tree oil, safflower seed oil, and peppermint oil
cons: May take a little longer than you would expect to rub into your skin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Got Rid of my Eczema
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with a bad patch of eczema behind my knee that was getting alarmingly worse every day. It was hot, burning, itching and driving me crazy. I tried about 6 different creams and combinations of remedies but everything just seemed to make it worse. I finally came on here and did a search for eczema creams and picked this one because of the reviews. It started having effect immediately, calming the burning and itching. I applied it twice a day, once in the morning before work and once after work. Each day it just got better and better until it cleared up completely. It took about 3-4 weeks to completely clear it up but it worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Dentist The Mentist

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Skin Care Product
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this product a week ago. I mainly purchased this for hemorrhoids but found other uses for it. First of all, let me say I used this on my hemorrhoids after trying for weeks, the OTC brand. After 1 week, not only did the pain and itching go away but it started to decrease the size of them. Then I tried this product on a blotch on my face. It has just about eliminated it. My wife has also tried it and is amazed at how well it works. It's truly worth every penny and more.
customer_reviews.author: Art W Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars which I may change to 5. I like that it seems to sooth irritated Eczema‎ spots on my skin which I have had all my life , and the smell is much lighter than some tea tree products which can be over whelming. I have only used the product for a couple of days which is why I will update later. The company is very responsive and the ingredients are all natural. The container that it comes in is small enough to slip in a purse to use for hands or lip balm. It feels kind of greasy when you first apply it, but is easily absorbed into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used about half the can now (it lasts forever) it's very good for any kind of skin irritation like everyone says. My favorite use is on my hands. I've had dry cracked cuticles and nails for so long and no cuticle cream or lotion ever did anything. One night I started rubbing this into my cuticles and after about a week I noticed a huge difference! My nails don't split and my cuticles look smooth and perfect. And I don't have to keep applying all day even if my hands get wet. For me morning and night is all it takes. This is amazing stuff and I love the portability, the subtle scent, and it won't spill.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Choate

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use on my face. I have a few dry/oily patchy areas with sensitive skin. The balm smells amazing. There are many tea tree items that have an overwhelming medicinal smell. Chamuel tea tree oil balm has a perfect balance of fragrances. It's not over-powering at all. The balm takes a little bit to absorb when using on my face, but it could be due to the natural oils. I started using it to soften my hands and especially the cuticles. It absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feeling. I would highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea oil! It saved my baby’s face and leg skin. I tried so many different oil or medicine on my baby for her eczema but not really work neither even expensive. The poor little one scratched all day and cried. But when I used it immediately it works. The face looks better right now. After a whole night the legs skin is better, too. I will use it to my elder daughter’s acne after the baby recovers totally! Very magic effects and will recommend to other babies. The ingredients are safe as it is pure tea oil. Perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: JIE YANG

customer_reviews.title: Handy, dandy, balm in a can.
customer_reviews.text: This solid melts into a lightly scented, nongreasy, light oil which absorbs promptly. It is lighter than Vaseline-type products, plus is all natural. The scent, suitable for males or females, disappears quickly when used on cuticles. Handy for skin breakouts, such as can happen with CPAP masks, this balm has Tea tree oil, which has an antiseptic quality, and is the fourth listed ingredient. Wheatgerm is the last listed ingredient. The balm comes in a small (just under 2.25 inch diameter) screw top, lightweight-metal can, so it is convenient and portable. This is good to have on hand for many skin conditions such as scrapes, dryness, and break-outs. The seller emails a list of several uses. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Northern SW

customer_reviews.title: Is anti fungal claim bogus?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on the claim on Amazon that it had anti fungal properties along with other benefits. I needed the anti fungal relief too. Nothing in the manufacturers claim on or accompanying the product when I got it home supports any anti fungal properties. The only way for me to know if it works on skin fungus is to use it. If it does not work will Amazon accept it for a refund and change the claims on its web page?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree Balm
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My hands were so very chapped and sore. I put some of this stuff on my hands and it was like immediate relief. My hands were so soft and they didn't look as if they belonged to an old woman, which I am. Even when I washed my hands it didn't wash off. My hands are still soft and I use it maybe every other day. I definitely highly recommend this stuff for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aleda N. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old. He has severe eczema. I've bought so many different body washes, creams, balms. But they haven't seemed to help or they hurt him while putting it on. The smell isn't the greatest but it is tea tree oil. I have used this 3 times a day for 2 days and have noticed a huge difference. His skin is healing and what helps the most is it doesn't hurt him while putting it on. I've used it on his feet, legs, hands, arms, face and neck. It has been a huge help and I'm so grateful for this product because it really is hard to see a child so young suffer with eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Highly effective Tea Tree Oil Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to relieve the itching and repair the skin from eczema, a form of atopic dermatitis. For context, doctors aren't sure what causes eczema. There is no known cure. After much research including The Mayo Clinic, WebMD, and a visit to a dermatologist, I can observe that the natural ingredients of this balm are the best. It did relieve some of the itching and improved the dryness and flakiness of the affected skin. I shall continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony W. Salinger

customer_reviews.title: Good for my first few uses
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm please. I've only used it a half dozen times or so, but each time I would say that the chapping/chafing/dryness that I combat with it has done away shortly and stayed away for longer than anticipated even. It's not supper greasy unless you use a bit to much, and dried in pretty quick everywhere except when I used it on my lips. Odor is, as one might expect bit like a strong tea or leafy, but I don't find it overbearing or unpleasant. When I run out I'd consider getting it again, maybe even in a bigger supply.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hipius

customer_reviews.title: Last ingredient out like 12 is tea tree so very low added tea tree
customer_reviews.text: Well I thought this was 100% tea tree oil in a balm form now I know to make a balm you need a ingredient to make it stick as such bit there are a lot ingredients in this and very last means leat ingrediant is finally tea tree so really won't do me much good for purpose I needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Angel baby Skys

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've used tea tree oil in one form or another for years now. It's disinfecting and moisturizing properties are well know. But this is the first time I've used it in a balm form and I love it. I've been using it on rough areas of my body...areas where I would usually use some sort of steroid cream or ointment, and it works great. And the fact that it's all natural gives me real peace of mind. It's nice to have an alternative to strong steroids and chemicals. And the fresh aroma of tea tree oil is quite enjoyable. If you have skin problems give this balm a try...it's like a magic bullet for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: It is antifungal but...
customer_reviews.text: works but not as strong as butenafine (lotrimin ultra). I've been using this for awhile but still have a slight itch. lotrimin (clotrimazole) did not work at all so I guess the strength of tea tree oil is between butenafine and clotrimazole
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable would recommend am buying my 2nd one.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!!!! I bought this because I had some severe itching and tried everything under the sun. I used it as soon as it arrived and the itching stopped immediately. It goes on so smoothly and makes your skin super soft, I have been using it on my feet, face and cuticles too it's the only moisturizer I need. I only wish it came in a larger container am ordering 4 more today.
customer_reviews.author: Jl iggs

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This is a super concentrated moisturized that gets the job done. I was surprised by how small the container was when I received the product but after using the stuff, I understand way. A little goes such a long way. I used a small amount on my finger to moisturize my entire foot! It smells like Tea Tree Oil and that's it. My husband uses this stuff on his dry, cracked hands. Great product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: H K Roop

customer_reviews.title: A must for dry lips, & cold sore sufferers.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lip balm because I developed the biggest cold sore in the long history of my cold sore life. The medicine I use to get rid of it dries out my lips so bad that when I go to eat, the darn sore cracks & oozes or bleeds. This lip balm, even though it's hard in the container, softens up with the heat of my finger. It goes on so creamy, that it doesn't hurt my cold sore, & it also helped heal it, due to the tea tree.
customer_reviews.author: Best Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a long time to review this cream. I purchased this product some time back and have been happy with its purchase. I am someone who loves creams and often is afflicted with dry skin. So it so beneficial for me to keep a tin of this with me. I put it in my bag and take it with me, wherever I go. I don’t like a cream that’s quite “oily” or something where I need to wash my hands with soap after application. So this is a godsent in that aspect. Similarly, I have tried several creams and they have strong perceptible scents, this has a mild fragrance of tea tree which works to my benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Nihit Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying this again !
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve only had this product for a day now but wow. Recently my little bit of ezcezma has flared and I suddeny have the worst patches of dry skin that I ever had before. It’s been more Itchy than before and all along my neck shoulders, stomach and now starting on my legs. Long story short a friend recommended this and as soon as I put this on after the shower it instantly took the itchy sensation away and it has wonderful slip and spreads amazing! It’s not too greasy and smells Suttle and doesn’t linger. Im gonna try this out and leave another review in a few weeks of using this.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.  Container not so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this balm. It is wonderful for chapped lips and itchy skin. There's little scent. I use it on my little granddaughter's dry lips and she loves the feel of it. The darn container is another story. It's a screw-off top that cross-threads far too easily. It takes longer to close it than to use the balm half the time. Otherwise this product would get a solid 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry elbows and nails that defy any lotion I've tried. Oils work much better but are a little messy and time consuming when you need to put something on and go. This balm is a wonderful product. It goes on easily and it absorbs quickly as you rub it into your skin. I am a huge fan of tea tree oil and its healing benefits so I am hoping that as I use this product it may even reduce the need for being applied so often as well. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: TEA TREE OIL BALM -100% All Natural * A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: The Tea Tree Oil Balm lives up to the hype! I've used it for about a week and have noticed the benefits within a couple of days! It has a nice consistency and mild scent. Goes on smooth and absorbs into the skin quickly. I use it twice a day. The tin container it comes in is convenient to carry in your pocket, bag , etc. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: I love this balm!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading the fantastic reviews and I’m joining the raving! This balm moisturises my extremely dry feet, my hands (I have always struggled to find hand lotion that actually works!) and I’m even trying it as a face moisturiser. My husband has this itchy rash on his neck and didn’t know what to do and I gave him some of the balm to try and he was thrilled that the itchiness went away. I love that all of the ingredients are natural. I will definitely be repurchasing again and again.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Fast, soothing relief of irritated, itchy skin...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for two members of my family who have extremely sensitive, problematic skin. The balm just arrived on Monday (9/10/18) and already it is proving to be such a great answer to so many skin irritations with my family; also to include the extremely dry skin on my elbows and heels. I will definitely be ordering more of this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff! Get you some
customer_reviews.text: It's good stuff! Had a small cyst on eye. Didnt take it off, but shrank it smaller. It is okay to use around the eyes and eye lids, which I was worried about. Been using about 3 weeks. Use almost every night. Smell is descent. I would deffently recommend trying this on a skin issue before seeing a doctor. But then again I'm not a doctor LOL
customer_reviews.author: Lifeaintbad

customer_reviews.title: Very good  Product and natural
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with painful external hemorrhoids my whole life. When I had my baby, it reached a new level. I'm skeptical of natural remedies... But this stuff has saved my life! My pain is relieved immediately. I don't even care that the Hemorrhoid is still there because I can't feel it! Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ibtissam

customer_reviews.title: Reconnected...
customer_reviews.text: Discovered this product about 3 years ago when looking for something for dry skin during the winter months. Based on the ingredients, purpose and reviews purchased it. After using it for a few days there was a noticeable difference; dry skin on my hands and heels was softer and smoother. Also, it had a very soft and subtle scent. Re-discovered this product a few weeks ago, purchased it, and it did not disappoint me. Will make sure I keep it on hand for year-round use!! Thank You Chamuel!!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: cleared up my dermatitis in just a few days....
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this balm for dermatitis on my eye lid, it totally cleared it up within a couple of nights. So I started using it on my cuticles and my feet, I love it! It doesn’t have the strong tea tree smell which had me thinking it might not work well but it turned out great and I think the lighter fragrance may have been a plus since that dermatitis is on my eye lid. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fleur de lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for Split and Cracking Nails and Fingers
customer_reviews.text: I get very dry, split and cracked nails and fingertips. I bought some cotton gloves and have been rubbing this on my nails and caking it underneath and on the fingertips every night then wearing the gloves to bed. My nails look wonderful now and although I still have a problem with one of my thumbs, I think if I continue this it will all clear up. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Effective And Natural
customer_reviews.text: I got this balm for scrapes and bug bites because I did not want to use something like Benadryl anti-itch cream. I've been working a lot in the yard lately and I've gotten a few bug bites. When I applied this balm to the red, itchy areas the swelling went down quickly and there was no itching. Within a few days, the bug bites had lost their size and the itching was gone. I don't use this as a moisturizer so I can't comment on that usage but I will keep this balm on hand
customer_reviews.author: Fiveorange

customer_reviews.title: Yes even hemorrhoids.
customer_reviews.text: I know it's not what this is made for and not something people like to discussed. BUT, I have been using it for hemorrhoids for a long time now. I used to constantly have them. I use this nightly now and I haven't had hemorrhoids in a long time. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry McFadyen

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have used for ezcema.
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I had to after I used this. Since moving to Alaska I get horrible ezcema on my hands. They get little blisters and pop. It's very painful. I ordered this because I was at the point of trying everything. Prescriptions and over the counter weren't cutting it. I used it one day, yes one day and my fingers look normal. It doesn't leave that oily feeling and smells wonderful. Fingers crossed this is my saving grace during winter. My hopes are high.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Got more than I bargained for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking around for some chapstick since I needed to buy a new set. When I was looking around for a good one, amazon instead referred me to ointment. Which was helpful for especially dry skin. My search led me to this balm. So far it's really helping in easing my dry spots, specifically my knuckles because I tend to wash my hands a lot. It's a good product, but the one downside so far is the smell. Thankfully it goes away after a couple of minutes after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: helps dry and flaky eczema
customer_reviews.text: I get eczema on my face and it is very frustrating. My skin becomes very dry and flaky and as a person that wears makeup it looks bad when the foundation dries up around the flaky areas. This product works very well in moisturizing the dry areas and helps reduces the itch. I just started using this product 4 days ago and can see huge results. I apply it at night before bed and in the morning as a thin layer and my makeup goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: michell

customer_reviews.title: Easy on skin and pleasant smelling
customer_reviews.text: My son had some fungal infection at the base of his neck from playing a lot of sports and probably not scrubbing when showering. I was using the generic Clotrimazole cream which was working but leaving the skin rough and itchy ... the chamuel tea tree balm worked great in soothing the irritation while also smootheing out the skin ... i’m reading from reviews that it can be used for other purposes as well but I haven’t tried it for any other purposes as yet ...
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Quick and lasting results!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the tea tree balm! I have been struggling with a case of eczema on both of my arms. The only thing that gave me some relief was tea tree oil but it did not last. I couldn't wait to try the tea tree balm. It was awesome! It not only gave me relief from the unbearable itching, but the rash immediately began to clear up. After 48 hrs it is nearly invisible. Another plus is the pleasant smell and how it lasts for hours. It was an answer to my prayers!!! If you want results, buy this balm.
customer_reviews.author: judie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely greasy
customer_reviews.text: This is so greasy it doesn't even absorb into your skin. As soon as you start any ordinary activity it wipes right off. I've been using it for a few days for extremely dry skin on my hands and it hasn't helped at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Only okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my hands were very dry from the winter and I have been experiencing dermatitis on the back of my hands as well. This product did help temporarily help with the itchiness and dry skin, however it was no better than any other lotion product I have tried. The odor is very mild and somewhat pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! Very soothing. Love all the other great-for-skin ingredients besides the tea tree oil: olive oil, lemon oil, lavender oil and some others. Excellent first aid and excellent for skin irritations. Right now I am using a thin coat once or twice a day as a facial moisturizer. Great for skin calming after hair removal. I adore the smell of this stuff. One minus: The tin it comes in was ridiculously hard to open. Maybe I didn't go about it the right way.
customer_reviews.author: Leah  B.

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE! My skin is clear!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would've taken a picture of my hands before using this tea tree balm. Because the ingredients are all natural, I was anxious to try. The back of both hands were extremely dry and I had a rash from my wrist towards my knuckles. For me, within 4 days of applying in the morning and at night, both hands are almost completely clear! I only recommend products that actually work and this is by far a must have! Can't wait to try some of their other natural products.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Don't Miss Out!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING!!! I have psoriasis on my scalp and it got rid of the itch, pain and swelling almost instantaneously. I put some on a bug bite and the bite was gone a few hours later. I had to buy a second one a few days after I received the first one because my husband and child love it as well. We are satisfied customers!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Baber

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have a recurring rash and after using this for a week, it was very much improved. I ran out of the product and it started to reappear after a few days. And the scent is not overpowering, just wish you got more for rhe money.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzytitan

customer_reviews.title: All in one moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: When I 1st purchased this product I was offered an incentive to write a review. I've waited more than six months to do so cause I believe its important to have a good honest review. I use this for many skin problems I have from chaffing, dry hands or feet, sometimes when my nose hurts I'll put a little dab up my nostrils. Recently I've found out this is also great for the tattoo healing process! Absolutely love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zane Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This balm is terrific! So smooth! I use tea tree oil for a lot of skin issues and in this form it is great! It is also long lasting and doesn't come off right away! Plus the scent is very mild. At first I wasn't a fan of the TTO scent, but now I find it very soothing!
customer_reviews.author: MeMi

customer_reviews.title: but afterwards my hands look and feel great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this predominantly on my hands by the way. It works well once integrated into my skin. Usually when I slather it on I have to wipe or wash my hands to kind of lessen the slick feel, but afterwards my hands look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: A New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cream and I'm glad to have discovered it. It comes in an attractive tin and is easy to use. The scent is light and pleasant. It's very soothing to the skin and altogether nice to use. I got it to help with a rash and am pleased with the results. It's also moisturizing so I anticipate also using it for chapped hands as the winter comes along.
customer_reviews.author: virginiabooklover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Works marvelously to soothe and treat a variety of issues. Product, service, and delivery all 5 star. Highly recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't use this long term
customer_reviews.text: (shawnnal) My son has sensitive skin and once I applied this product to his diaper rash area he scream so loud with pain that I rushed him in the tub and washed him off with soap. I think its a little too strong for 12 month old to use because it also burned on his eczema spots.
customer_reviews.author: john laster

customer_reviews.title: actually soothes my eczema
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and a combination of ingredients that actually soothes my eczema. So glad the ingredients are all from nature and not man made. Was impressed by the quality and care put into the graphics and box preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Skyland

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for one reason, but found it better for another
customer_reviews.text: The original container I got appeared to be cross-threaded and I couldn't get it open. The owner contacted me to see how I liked it and I explained the issue. They immediately sent me a replacement and no problem opening it. I originally bought this for a rash, but it didn't seem to help much. However, I had consistent, noticeable dry spots on my face, so I tried it there. It really helped. I would most definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: laurie hallwyler

customer_reviews.title: Great natural balm!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Fast shipping -Product exactly as described. -Smells very light -Wasn’t very greasy -Worked as stated Cons: -None! Product purchased due to my son having excema. We have been using it daily and it has helped ease the itching. Smell isn’t strong and hasn’t stained his clothes. A little goes a long way. We enjoy all the products and as you can see in the second picture purchased them. Would recommend them to family and friends! Great products!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S Simmons II

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: This all natural balm has great ingredients. I have only had it for a few days and am more than satisfied.I have found that even though tea tree oil may not have the greatest smell, it is an oil that has worked for me. Give this balm a try..you may find, such as I have, that is useful for a variety of skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a jar
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I live by tea tree ANYTHING. From essential oils, to face moisturizers, etc. When I found this, I decided to give it a try just to put on after shaving because tea tree always soothes irritation for me. Although, it’s very stuff in the container, once I scoop a little chunk out, it melts into my skin and I love it. I’ve also been using it on top of a tattoo that is in the healing process of peeling, and for those who know, it’s also a very itchy step in the healing process and this has helped tremendously. 10/10 for moisturizing and soothing. But if you don’t like strong scents of tea tree, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Marsal Rassa

customer_reviews.title: soothing affect
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I wanted to try and use it for my psoriasis hoping for a soothing effect and to stop the itching! I have used the balm for 10 days morning and night, my skin is smoother and not itching or flaking as often! This balm is more natural and not a steroid that was prescribed. I don't mind using the balm as it has a nice scent and isn't greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Luc299

customer_reviews.title: No returns!! Should tell all!
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Ineffective. I was unable to return after I found out that it isn't useful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Derohanessian

customer_reviews.title: Love This Non-Greasy Balm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great balm. If you don't like greasy balms, this one is for you. It soaks right in and doesn't stay greasy on the skin, yet it is very moisturizing. I am not a big fan of the smell of tea tree so I love that this tea tree balm has a mild fragrance and is not overwhelming. I can use this before leaving the house and not worry that I smell like tea tree. This won't be my first purchase. Also, I like that the seller sends a follow-up email.
customer_reviews.author: Charm

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but would like stronger concentration of tea tree oils.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: helps dry skin, eczema, absorbs somewhat fast (10 min) Cons: not very high concentration of tea tree oil, so less effect on eczema, psoriasis, etc. Neutral: low concentration of oil = low odor/aromatics.
customer_reviews.author: KuRosU

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  Excellent results.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I put it on my face to moisturize my face. It takes away dry skin. I put it under my eyes and the dark spots fade. I also use it as a lip balm. It does a great job moisturizing my lips. It leaves skin and lips feeling soft. It has a nice scent and texture to it. I definitely would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The only drawback is that it will leave you a little greasy if you put too much on. However, as someone who suffers from Seborrheic Dermatitis, I have to be cognizant of what I put on my face and this works wonders. My face clears up in no time with this and proper face maintenance. So I honestly have no problems, just remember to not put so much on to avoid greasiness and maybe be aware of the smell - it's not bad, but it does smell lie Tea Tree.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Great cream!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. It really helps my dry skin patches. They also have a great customer service department & that's important. I emailed them because I was having a tough time opening the container & they answered me right away & offered to send me another container. I finally got it opened (I think it was my fault) & have been using it every day. Really works!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as stated!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not relieve the itching as advertised. Wondering how much essential oils are really in this product. I use essential oils all the time. I am disappointed with this product's performance. And beware there is no return policy on this product. I guess the company does not stand behind their products. My mistake for not noticing that. I will make sure I never buy anything else from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: antifungal it is not!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work and seems to make the itch worse. Wasted money. No return possible. Refund would be right. Read about money back guarantee. I like to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Natural Alternative for Athlete's Foot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I wanted to move away from using the athlete's foot spray Tinactin. I was looking for a natural alternative and read that tea tree oil was a natural fungicide. After a couple weeks of use, Chaumel's Tea Tree Balm does the job and more. In addition to replacing the need for me to use Tinactin, it smells great and moisturizes. So if you are looking for a natural alternative for your athlete's foot spray or powder this is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mayon

customer_reviews.title: Not for all skin types or for all skin conditions. To each his own!
customer_reviews.text: Is is moisturizing, yes. Does it smell great, no. Did nothing but clog my pores and break me out in my chin area. Did NOTHING for my perioral dermatitis, but irritate it some more to the point where my skin burned. I was washing my face with Spectro gel and then applying this and that’s it. Spectro was drying out my POD but I needed a moisturizer so I got this and it just irritated it like crazy. Made it burn so bad. This isn’t a product for me and I had so much hope in it. Doesn’t mean it can’t work for you. My skin just isn’t a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Eczema Prone Skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve already purchased this twice in only a few weeks because I slather my body neck to toe with it. I’ve had a really horrible flare up of inflamed skin (dermatitis) and bought this on a whim since it’s chemical free. THANK GOD I found this because it’s been the only thing to help me. The tea tree is a natural antibacterial and actually smells way better than the non fragrance stuff I am stuck using. I wish this came in a bigger size but for now I have this ordered on repeat. It’s not greasy at all to me. I apply this after a shower when my skin is still warm/damp.
customer_reviews.author: NCF

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I got this for some dry skin I have around my mouth that tends to be pretty painful most of the time if it gets out of hand. I find that this product doesn’t really seep into my skin. It kind of just feels like it’s sitting on top of my skin not really doing a whole lot. I’m sure this product is great for most people, just not for my severely dry skin
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Work wonderfully and smells great!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been struggling with my psoriasis for a while now and since the most part of the front of my legs are covered in it I gave this product a try. Guess what?! Not only is it soothing for the itch and softening my skin but, I swear it’s healing my legs. They look sooo much better and feel soo good. Thank you I am absolutely keeping my subscribe and save for this product!! 💕
customer_reviews.author: Taña T. Starr

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works miracles! This is a Vaseline-textured balm, so I've only applied it in problem areas. It really did wonders for my skin and helped my angular chelaitis. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product. My hands and feet have never felt better, soft, crack free after only a few uses. It has a pleasant lite sent. I would give this Product Ten Stars, you must try this amazing product, It's a balm and there for you don't have to use very much to get the coverage you want. Very cost effective. Mark
customer_reviews.author: CNAMAS

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing but didnt help my heat rash
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a heat rash but it doesnt really help that. It is moisturizing and the smell is pleasant. Just didnt work for the issue I bought it for
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. F.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Tried everything for under breast skin irritation and itching due to sweating. Prescription and over-the-counter medicines had no effect. I read about the benefits of tea tree oil and decided to give this a try. It was like a miracle! No more itching or irritation. Gave some to my sister who had the same problem and she was amazed at how quickly it worked. The jar is small, but you only need a small amount. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what is exactly wrong with my face but i have constant dry flakes around my nostrils, on my chin and above my top lip. There's also tons of redness and some broken blood vessels. I've legit tried every oil and moisturizer i can find. I've used this for 2 days and so far so good. It's light and makes my skin smooth. I'll update this in a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: XoXo

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement - Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This is absolute garbage. I bought this as a natural diaper rash since it claims to work for that. I used it a few times yesterday, and this morning my baby's rash is WAY MORE irritated. I'm better off with Desitin. I'm only upset, because I can't even return this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Effective Product!
customer_reviews.text: Effective product! I was amazed how it had stopped my itching as I have tried countless of remedies to stop my allergy itch this spring season. I was hesitant at first because I already tried bunch of skin remedies but this Tea Tree Balm is a unique one. I highly recommend this product and anyone looking for instant skin remedy should get this!
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was using a "diaper rash" product for this problem and it was far too messy. This balm soothed my rash and effectively cured it within 2 days. I combined it with coconut oil and am very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: June Boucher

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well to sooth bug bites, dry skin, cracked heels. Only thing I did not love was the smell. It’s tolerable only because it doesn’t linger all day. Overall this is a good product and you only need a little bit so it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: C. Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: That this product is not 100% tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought that it was 100% tea tree oil but it is not , I have tinea versa color , I will use it, but I was expecting a 100% tea tree oil product . If it is not affective for my skin condition , I will discontinue use and purchase a 100% tea tree oil product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Daves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for skin rashes!!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this product in England recently, and decided to buy some while in the 'States'. It was very effective for me overseas with a skin rash, and continues to keep my skin rash-free. There is a slight, but pleasant, odor to the balm. I will be ordering another tin to keep overseas. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LeoCJ

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but does the job
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very soothing and so is the balm on itches. I compared this to another salve that is popular on Amazon; both works about the same but this balm is more gentle and has less peeling effect. I've purchased this for another relative and am on second tin. Wonderful product. Thank you for making it.
customer_reviews.author: bananamama

customer_reviews.title: Points for portability, but doesn't absorb in terribly fast and doesn't moisturize as well as oil.
customer_reviews.text: It's good, but doesn't absorb in terribly fast. I need it for my hands, and I find myself with greasy palms. It does moisturize better than any lotion or creme I've ever used, but not as well as straight-up oil. Points for portability.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for persistent dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this balm. Certain parts of my face got extremely dry recently and I've tried several moisturizes, but none worked quite as well; my skin would either not get any better or the dryness would come back after a few days. I've used this on my face and lips, and they've never been so smooth before. I saw results just a few days into using this balm. Highly recommend this tea tree oil balm.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great and works incredibly fast. I am super impressed with the quality of this.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta

customer_reviews.title: The best balm!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using tree tea balm and come cross this product. I decide to give a try. Oh I love it! I put it in my purse because it is seal very well and not melting. This tree tea is wonderful for instant to relief itching, bite, bruise, scratch, pierces, and rashes.
customer_reviews.author: HMoM

customer_reviews.title: Made a difference to clear up the acne!!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this Tea Tree balm from the Amazon site after reading how amazing the product is, but was really surprised that it had cleared up my skin. I had acne on my legs for a long time and had used several products but this product made a difference within few days. I will continue to use this product till it clears up my skin completely. But since it is made of natural ingredients, maybe that helped to clear up my skin! I usually don’t endorse products unless it has worked for me but this.. made a difference! And was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: asha

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is better than any other tea balm I've tried. I don't know what the reason, but this helps my skin heal and keep from cracking. The smell is mills and pleasent too. It only take a little bit, this can lasts for about 6 months using every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mumma

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who has pretty severe angular cheilitis. He gets it so bad, that it spreads all over his chin and cheeks. I wanted something natural and not harsh. This seemed to do the trick. I alternate between organic coconut oil and this. This stuff really cleared him up in a matter of a few days. It smells nice, and he doesn’t mind putting it on and leaving it on. I would definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful version of Tea Tree oil!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding- do not hesitate to order this! Perfect combination of tea tree oil but in a great creamy consistency. I did not order it for any particular issue- I just wanted the benefit of tea tree oil in a more pleasant format than straight(stronger smelling) oil.
customer_reviews.author: New England customer

customer_reviews.title: happy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been having an issue with Angela chelititus for about 4 months now and I've tried what I thought was everything. I tried this stuff on a whim using a few times a day. After a week my problem is 98% gone. I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tegan H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Balm!
customer_reviews.text: I am Very impressed by the quality - from the packaging to the balm itself!. It is smooth and absorbent without greasy or sticky feeling. No Tea Tree oil smell.. It is so soothing! It should have the anti-fungal properties because of the Tea Tree oil and anti-bacterial properties from the essential oils...I already started using and I am already inpressed. I will continue to use but so far this is an Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: MCK

customer_reviews.title: Use it for itching skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my skin itched. Nothing else I’d tried had solved my itching problem. After I applied the balm to my skin, the itching stopped immediately!
customer_reviews.author: KATHY D THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff for dry sensitive hands
customer_reviews.text: Love this Tea Tree moisturizer. My hands have thinned out with age and washing my hands so much has really taken its toll. I find that using this Tea Tree moisturizer with cotton gloves helps heal and keep them soft.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm9

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hair balm slays the human hair units
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to keep my middle parted hair laying flat. It worked instantly on a human hair Brazalian wavy 24 inch hair. So satisfied with the immediate results. No heat necessary. Great consistency. A balm. Worth buying 👌.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlie Okemuyiwa

customer_reviews.title: Great for eczema and dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: The product is greasy, but does work well to reduce dryness. I have chronic skin issues on hands and legs. Eczema seems to clear up after using the product for a few days. Smells like pine cleaner, but benefits out weight sent.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing...so many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews, but I really like this balm. It has a nice smell. It's light and moisturizing. I use it on my lips, hands and scalp. My scalp gets dry and itchy at times, so I started using the balm on those areas. It doesn't take much and I like that it's light and doesn't weigh down your hair or make it too oily. My hairstylist commented on how healthy and shiny my hair looked when I saw her last week. I told her that using the balm is the only thing that I changed. She was impressed and so am I!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product. smell not overwhelming. highly recommemded.
customer_reviews.text: bought this product for my husband. he has a red patch skin in his leg. been using a lot of moisturizer some help but it wont last. i love using tea tree oil but the smell is too strong. until i found this product. i love the balm its not too greasy. the smell is just perfect and it really helps my husband from his itchy skin and moisturize the skin well. It did relieve some of the itching and improved the dryness and flakiness of the affected skin. I shall continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry toledo

customer_reviews.title: A SKIN SUFFERS DREAM CREAM
customer_reviews.text: I could write a long positive review of this cream, but you want to know one thing: it works. Whether for rough skin or excema, for seniors or toddlers, this cream is for anyone who wants a greaseless solution for a variety of skin problems. It absorbs quickly and has a very pleasant odor. In one word .... it’s FABULOUS! (And I wasn’t paid to say so)
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is natural and what I expected. It's not very moisturizing on my dry skin(elbows and arms) unless I slather it on. The packaging is nice & simple. The product came in great condition. I'm handing it over to my boyfriend to try out for his "chub rub" from work.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have used Tea Tree Oil for several years - in liquid form. It's wonderful but not always convenient carrying the bottle around, PLUS Tea Tree Oil has a very strong odor. This balm resolves both those issues and we love it!!! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyfair524

customer_reviews.title: Dry hand saver
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase! Using it for my dry hands. Before I go to bed at night, I rub it on my hands and it protects it thru the night. Next morning, don't see those same as y spots like before.
customer_reviews.author: Ray P

product_meta.title: TEA TREE OIL BALM -100% All Natural | Great Antifungal Cream for Soothing Skin Irritations like Eczema, Psoriasis, Rashes, Jock Itch, Folliculitis, Angular Cheilitis, Itches, Dry Chapped Skin, Heels, Cuticles, Hemorrhoids, Saddle Sores and more!
feature_bullets: GET QUICK RELIEF OF ITCHY, CRACKED, INFLAMED, SORE, AND IRRITATED SKIN. Provides immediate relief to insect bites, itchy spots, saddle sores, heat rash, diaper rash, jock itch, razor burn, folliculitis, split cracked cuticles, severely chapped lips, baby eczema, psoriasis, dry hands and dry feet with a fresh, clean citrus scent. A MUST HAVE in your bathroom, purse, and office drawer! Money Back Guarantee!

100% ALL NATURAL and effective formula containing properties to soothe the itching and irritation on hands, fingernails, feet, heels toenails, scalp, under breast skin and essentially any other irritated part of the body. All Natural with No Reported Side-effects.

THE MOST EFFECTIVE COMBINATION OF NATURAL INGREDIENTS including Tea Tree Oil, Green Tea, Peppermint Oil, Lavender Oil, Lemon Oil (& more) and the carrier agents Olive Oil and Beeswax to stay in place and provide long lasting relief. Clinically proven ingredients to relieve mild and stubborn skin irritations.

THIS BALM WORKS – SEE THE REVIEWS! Contains no harsh chemicals, parabens, fragrances, or artificial ingredients. Natural alternative to lysine, hydrocortizone. terrasil, lotrimin, lamisil and over-the-counter anti-itch and antifungal creams. Can be used on Children and Adults with SENSITIVE SKIN!
1200+ 5-Star Reviews! Manufactured to US FDA standards. BONUS information insert included!!
